tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    symptoms TEXT,
    diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  age INT,
  gender STRING,
  blood_type STRING,
  address STRING
);

CREATE TABLE symptoms (
  symptom_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  symptom_name STRING,
  severity INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_height FLOAT,
    patient_weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_symptoms (
    patient_id INT,
    symptom_id INT,
    date_reported DATE,

    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, symptom_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (symptom_id) REFERENCES symptoms(symptom_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Symptoms (
  symptom_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  symptom_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Diagnoses (
  diagnosis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
  symptom_id INT REFERENCES Symptoms(symptom_id),
  diagnosis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  diagnosis_id INT REFERENCES Diagnoses(diagnosis_id),
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  blood_type VARCHAR(5)
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  diagnosis_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  condition_name VARCHAR(50),
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  treatment_id INT
);
